title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: May 28, 2022, 07:03:33 AMLast edit: March 29, 2025, 09:52:22 AM by cygan
content: i have been thinking about this thread for a while and today is finally the day since there is such a thread in this kind not yet and there are certainly users present here, with the time also Bitcoin/crypto stickers have accumulated, i would like to open here a kind of sticker collection thread and you like to ask also your stickers to show us and here is my current sticker collection:mx12.levins stickers   ColdKey stickers  AlpenCoin stickers1HoDLCLUB stickersBitcoin Penny stickers FreeBitcoins stickers Doblezero and krogoth stickers CoinsOfNakamoto stickersSatochip stickersLucho Poletti Bitcoin stickers    Madex stickers    various BTC stickers                   sticker collections from other users:Quote from: BobbyCoins on May 28, 2022, 09:38:22 AM‚úÇ  Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on May 28, 2022, 12:11:18 PM‚úÇ                             Quote from: doblezero on November 07, 2022, 06:40:13 PMDOBLEBIT STICKERQuote from: doblezero on January 13, 2024, 06:24:49 PMnew stickers for the collection.Quote from: Steeley on February 28, 2025, 05:51:03 PM‚úÇÔ∏èQuote from: bitbollo on March 11, 2025, 06:31:19 PM‚úÇÔ∏è

comments.author: doblezero
comments.body: I love your stickers.I would love to get stickers of everything related to cryptocurrencies, if someone has leftover stickers, I would love to receive them.These are some of my mini collection

comments.author: BobbyCoins
comments.body: If you can put it in an album it gets collected

comments.body: Nice thread cygan¬† Here‚Äôs a few more not on the list so far¬† What about a different thread for badges, keyrings, pins etc

comments.author: cygan
comments.created_time: May 28, 2022, 10:19:11 AMLast edit: May 15, 2023, 04:46:01 PM by cygan
comments.body: i am very happy that this thread is so well received by you plebs and that you share your sticker collections with all of us here i had many other stickers ... they were all stuck on my laptop and this has given up the spirit at the beginning of this year Quote from: haloxon on May 28, 2022, 07:43:13 AMQuote from: cygan on May 28, 2022, 07:03:33 AMvarious BTC stickersmaybe I'm wrong, but I think the little gentleman (2nd row on the left) is also by Bitcoin Penny. at least, I'm always associating both with each other¬† ¬† maybe they can comment or someone else can verify.i can easily remember getting this sticker together with the other bp stickers, but i am not 100% sure anymore - would be good if @BitcoinPenny here would confirm it. then i would also change it in my listing

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: my stickers are loosely framed (they are not peeled/stuck but have a small pieced of double sided tape on the back of each to hold them in place) I dont have them sorted or named in any fashion though - some are by some well known Bitcoin artists and others are just generic stickers handed out from conferences or that I received with various shipments. In with some of the stickers are also Pins (most from btcpins) and doodles done by Bitcoin Penny. At the end there are comic strips I kept from a 2021 Dilbert calendar where all the comics were about "Bitcoin"Some of them are even from companies I detest (Binance for example) - I have them simply to collect/preserve The final image is my biggest "sticker" its 2 foot by 2 foot and is more like a sign but it is quite sticky on the back so I am going to call it my largest sticker.I apologize for the pics quality/angles/lighting these are all up on my office walls

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: @MoparMiningLLC this is really a very huge and beautiful collection  the idea with the framing of the stickers i also find very goodüëç

comments.body: Love the stickers! Seem to have them all over, I tried to find some of mine that were not duplicates already posted here. I will have to try to consolidate and organize them like some of the others here have done. Can't wait to see what others have.Geo
